venue.name: National Park Service Salem Visitor Center

item.description:
Information regarding the Upcoming Salem Trip.

Many of the locations will be indoors & dark.

It will be helpful if you bring a small flashlight with you as you attend the tours.

Are you planning on staying overnight?

The usual overnight things. Bring some photo device.

Pay attention because there will be some Locations that do not allow photos to be taken. For Example, During the first part of the Salem Witch Museum tour, they do not allow photos. When you go downstairs for the second part of The Tour, photos can be taken;

http://www.salemwitchmuseum.com/

www.salemwitchmuseum.com/

I cannot find that little tip anywhere on their site.

There is a Lot of Walking.

Some of the walking areas have very "period" and Very uncomfortable walk ways.

Even with taking the Trolley or other means of transportation there is still A lot of walking.

 FYI During the House of 7 Gables Tour there are some very confining areas.

 If you want to go on this tour, then I will either be

Somewhere else or waiting in the Café.

More updates on this event if necessary.

http://www.7gables.org/

www.7gables.org/

The Peabody Museum can keep you busy all day.

Do not plan on going there & seeing too many other attractions.

Backpacks & similar items will be searched &

Kept in a secure room as you are in the Museum.

As of the last time that I was there, photos are not allowed.

http://www.pem.org/

www.pem.org/

Every time that I go to Salem, I discover something different'

Here's a link for more Salem information:

http://www.salem.org/

www.salem.org/

http://www.salemweb.com/

www.salemweb.com/

To get a very good view of Salem streets, then look at The below link.

http://www.bestmaps.com/

www.bestmaps.com/

We could park either in front of the Salem Mall or in the Parking lot between the Mall

& the Visitor's Center. We will try to fit in 3 or 4 attractions for the day.

We might need to break off into different groups depending on who wants to go where.

I do plan on walking down the Essex Pedestrian Mall.

We will arraign to meet each other at the Visitor's Center at a certain time later in the afternoon.

Some of us might either go back to our hotel & then go Back to Salem later on or stay late enough to go on a Ghost Tour.

The Ghost Tour that I enjoyed a few years ago was

http://www.spellboundtours.com

www.spellboundtours.com

Please let me know if you have any comments or questions.

A lot of us need a break with everything that has been happening.

Directions that I will be taking. (This depends on traffic, if I - 95 is busy then I will take back roads to I - 91.) I - 95 N to I - 91 N to I - 84 to Mass Pike 90 to Exit 22 I-495 to Exit 24 to (back roads to avoid the highways) Rt 20 Main Street (Massachusetts has hard to see signs so becare when trying to look for Rts.) To Rt 60 Linden Street to Rt 1 Going into Salem, I usually take Rte 1 to Rte. 62 East, turn right onto Rte 1A.. This goes to Salem Common Park. Take a right to head towards Salem Mall Parking Garage.

Closer to the date we can discuss car pooling.

I enjoyed this motel, but others might go to Different Motels. Motel 6 Danvers 65 Newbery Street (Rt. 1), Danvers (978) 774- 8045

6 miles Northwest of Salem Center

http://www.orbitz.com/hotel-info/MA/MX-01078.html

www.orbitz.com/hotel-info/MA/MX-01078.html

http://www.motel6.com/

www.motel6.com/

I will give more information closer to the event.

 

7/17/11  The event that was going to happen on August 13 has been

pushed to sometime in September TBD.  I have a non-MU event to

Attend on 8/13.  Salem weekend is still the weekend of 8/20th.

You don't have to go to the motel for the weekend if you think

That you can make Salem a day trip event.  I have make

Salem a day trip event but I do not think that it is as much fun,

So I get a motel for Friday & Saturday nights.

 

6/22/11

Something came up on August 13 that will make a great Meet Up  Event

for this group so I am rescheduling Salem Trip to August 20.

Mike B

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone's Salem Trip on August 19 to 21
